directions: [["Add all base ingredients to the instant pot and stir together"],["Cook at pressure for 10 minutes and allow pressure to release naturally"],["Remove chicken, shred, and add back to instant pot"],["Add extra ingredients, stir, and cook on slow cook mode for 10 minutes"],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""]]
